events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund immediately.
The reported issue was identified as a refund request related to an incorrect delivery.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I am sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help get this sorted out for you.
Could you please provide your order number and upload a picture of the item you received?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the wrong product I got.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 5 business days and provide a prepaid return label.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the help resolving this issue.
Your refund has been completed and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if anything else is needed.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and that the issue is fully resolved.
Since we haven’t heard back, we will now close your case. Feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
